item.title: 被制裁的液化天然气运输船聚集在俄罗斯附近，买家稀少
item.description: 来自俄罗斯的液化天然气油轮正在该国远东海岸附近集结，这表明在西方不断收紧的限制措施下，很难找到买家。【原文：Tankers carrying sanctioned liquefied natural gas from Russia are gathering off the country’s far eastern coast, a sign of the difficulties in finding buyers in the midst of ever-tightening western restrictions.】

item.title: 超微计算机审计师安永在司法部调查中辞职
item.description: 陷入困境的服务器制造商超微计算机公司的审计师安永会计师事务所（Ernst & Young LLP）已辞去该公司注册会计师的职务。【原文：Ernst & Young LLP, the auditor to troubled server maker Super Micro Computer Inc., has resigned as the company’s registered public accounting firm.】

item.title: 德国通胀率大幅上升，凸显欧洲央行面临的挑战
item.description: 德国通胀率的上升速度超过预期，并超过了欧洲央行 2% 的目标--这凸显了政策制定者在决定进一步放宽货币政策的步伐和程度时所面临的挑战。【原文：German inflation quickened more sharply than expected and exceeded the European Central Bank’s 2% target – underpinning the challenges for policymakers in deciding on the pace and extent of further monetary-policy easing.】

item.title: Coinbase 零售需求成为症结所在，利润却出现反弹
item.description: 鉴于许多散户交易者似乎仍然对动荡的加密货币世界保持警惕，第三季度收入的激增可能不足以消除投资者对 Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：A surge in third-quarter revenue may not be enough to lift the investor reluctance that seems to surround Coinbase Global Inc. given that many retail traders appear to remain wary of the volatile world of cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 总统的所有动向特朗普贸易结束了吗？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 在经历了臃肿时代之后，老牌视频游戏开发商正在缩小规模
item.description:
由于功能强大的游戏制作工具越来越容易获得，精简的工作室如雨后春笋般涌现

。【原文：

Thanks in part to the growing accessibility of powerful game-making tools, pared-down studios are proliferating

】

item.title: 里夫斯在工党首份预算案中将英国税收提高 400 亿英镑
item.description: 雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，她将在其历史性的首份预算案中增税400亿英镑（约合518亿美元），以增加公共服务支出，弥补上届保守党政府留下的财政漏洞。【原文：Rachel Reeves said she was raising taxes by £40 billion ($51.8 billion) in her historic first budget, to boost spending on public services and to cover a fiscal hole she said was left by the previous Conservative government.】

item.title: 尼日利亚希望尽快解决对壳牌石油资产出售的反对意见
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布的能源特别顾问 Olu Verheijen 表示，尼日利亚上游石油监管机构发现壳牌拟向当地公司财团出售陆上资产存在一些问题，但这些问题应该很快就会得到解决。【原文：Nigeria’s upstream oil regulator found some issues with Shell’s proposed sale of its onshore assets to a consortium of local companies but they should be resolved soon, said Olu Verheijen, President Bola Tinubu’s special adviser on energy.】

item.title: 投资基金加码押注欧洲天然气仍有上升空间
item.description: 投资基金加大了对欧洲天然气价格仍有上涨空间的押注，表明对供应问题的持续担忧。【原文：Investment funds stepped up bets that European natural gas prices have room to rise, signaling continued concerns about supply.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行改变瑞典央行呼吁，将降息幅度减半
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的分析师表示，瑞典央行下周可能会加大宽松步伐，因为几乎没有迹象表明迄今为止的降息刺激了瑞典央行所期待的经济复苏。【原文：The Riksbank is likely to increase the pace of easing next week, as there is little indication that interest rate cuts so far have spurred the economic recovery the Swedish central bank is expecting, analysts at Danske Bank A/S said.】

item.title: 德国经济停滞不前，能源需求将创历史新低
item.description: 据研究机构 AG Energiebilanzen 称，随着欧洲最大经济体陷入停滞，德国的能源消耗将连续第二年降至历史最低水平。【原文：Germany’s energy consumption is poised to drop to a record low for a second consecutive year as Europe’s largest economy stalls, according to research group AG Energiebilanzen.】

item.title: 英国 Centrica 公司通过 Coterra 能源交易扩大天然气采购量
item.description: Centrica Plc 与 Coterra Energy 达成天然气购销协议，这是该英国公司在来自亚洲的激烈竞争中确保天然气供应的最新举措。【原文：Centrica Plc agreed with Coterra Energy to purchase and sell natural gas, in the UK company’s latest move to secure supplies amid stiff competition from Asia.】

item.title: 施莱格尔表示，瑞士央行已准备好应对特朗普大选带来的法郎跳水问题
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长表示，如果美国总统大选结果导致瑞士法郎升值，瑞士国家银行准备干预货币市场。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is prepared to intervene in currency markets if the outcome of the US presidential election leads to an appreciation of the franc, its president said.】

item.title: 空中客车公司接近达成向沙特新公司利雅得航空公司提供数十架喷气机的协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）即将获得一份订单，向沙特阿拉伯的新航空公司出售数十架窄体喷气式飞机。【原文：Airbus SE is closing in on an order to sell dozens of narrowbody jets to Saudi Arabia’s new carrier, according to people familiar with the matter, as the kingdom pours billions of dollars into turning the country into an aviation and tourism hub.】

item.title: S.非洲计划通过基础设施投资信托基金吸引资金
item.description: 南非计划建立基础设施投资信托基金，并设立混合融资工具，以吸引投资建设道路、输电网络和其他公共工程项目。【原文：South Africa plans to establish infrastructure investment trusts and set up a blended-finance vehicle to lure investment to build roads, power-transmission networks and other public-works projects.】

item.title: S.尽管遭到反对，非洲财政部仍在权衡债务上限方案
item.description: 尽管南非最大的政党内部反对，但南非政府仍在考虑是否采用新的财政支柱，为公共财政提供一条可持续的长期发展道路。【原文：South Africa’s government is still considering whether to adopt a new fiscal anchor that will provide a sustainable long-term path for public finances, despite opposition from within the country’s biggest political party.】

item.title: 南非首份联合预算案的赢家和输家
item.description: 南非的中期预算--这是自 6 月份新联合政府成立以来的第一份预算--侧重于吸引投资者投资基础设施项目，但支出的增加和低于预期的收入意味着预算赤字超出了预期。【原文：South Africa’s medium-term budget – the first since the formation of a new coalition government in June – focused on luring investors for infrastructure projects, but an increase in spending and lower-than-anticipated revenue meant the budget deficit exceeded forecasts.】

item.title: 南非财政部长最新预算报告要点
item.description: 以下是南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦发布的南非 2024 年中期预算政策声明的要点。【原文：Below are the highlights of South Africa’s 2024 medium-term budget policy statement released by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Cape Town on Wednesday.】

item.title: 债务轨迹恶化，南非寻求投资
item.description: 南非商业友好型联合政府公布的第一份最新预算显示，债务轨迹正在恶化，经济增长前景略有改善，因此更有必要吸引更多投资。【原文：The first budget update delivered by South Africa’s business-friendly coalition government shows a worsening debt trajectory and a marginally improved outlook for economic growth, heightening the need to lure more investment.】

item.title: S.非洲向国家工作人员提供提前退休以削减工资支出
item.description: 南非政府正在恢复一项让高级公务员提前退休的计划，以减少工资支出。【原文：South Africa’s government is reinstating a plan to offer early retirement to senior civil servants as it seeks to reduce its wage bill.】

item.title: Aquarian 收购绿色地产贷款机构 PACE Equity 的股份
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份声明，投资公司 Aquarian Holdings 收购了 PACE Equity 的大部分股份，该公司向房地产开发商和业主发放商业物业评估清洁能源贷款，即 C-PACE 贷款。【原文：Investment firm Aquarian Holdings has purchased a majority stake in PACE Equity, which hands out commercial property assessed clean energy, or C-PACE loans, to real estate developers and owners, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 阿波罗创始人哈里斯称大型私募股权投资公司已将阿尔法抛在后面
item.description: 26North Partners 的创始人乔希-哈里斯（Josh Harris）说，他创办公司的目的是让另类资产管理重新获得巨大的市场回报。【原文：26North Partners founder Josh Harris said he started his firm to bring big, market-beating returns back to alternative asset management.】

item.title: Jumia 和土耳其 Hepsiburada 计划推动非洲电子商务增长
item.description: 专注于非洲的在线零售商 Jumia Technologies AG 和土耳其最大的电子商务平台之一 Hepsiburada 已同意在非洲共同拓展业务。【原文：Africa-focused online retailer Jumia Technologies AG and Hepsiburada, one of Turkey’s largest e-commerce platforms, have agreed to jointly expand their offerings across Africa.】

item.title: 微策略相对于英伟达的优异表现掩盖了人们对股票溢价的日益担忧
item.description: 自两年前加密货币市场崩溃以来，微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：Since the collapse of crypto markets two year ago, MicroStrategy Inc. has outperformed almost every major US stock, including AI bellwether Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 石油生产商与增加供应计划搏斗
item.description:
"欧佩克+"将于 12 月开始每天增加多达 250 万桶石油，但该组织可能需要等待。【原文：

OPEC+ is due to start adding as much as 2.5 million barrels a day in December, but the group may have to wait.

】

item.title: 部长称安哥拉的收入仅够支付薪金和偿还债务
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长说，安哥拉面临贷款支付高峰，要求这个产油国将所有财政收入用于支付工资和偿还债务。【原文：Angola faces peak loan payments that require the oil-producing nation to use all of its fiscal revenue to pay salaries and to service debt, its finance minister said.】

item.title: 沃派克认为地缘政治紧张局势将促进对石油储存的需求
item.description: Koninklijke Vopak NV 公司表示，地缘政治和石油未来的不确定性推动了对石油储存的需求，促使该公司上调了年度利润展望。【原文：Koninklijke Vopak NV said geopolitics and uncertainty about the future of oil are driving demand to store petroleum, prompting the company to upgrade its annual profit outlook.】

item.title: 花旗策略师称，如果特朗普获胜推动股市反弹，应抛售股票
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能在下周美国大选中获胜之前，美国股市可能会反弹，但对于花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：US stocks may be rallying ahead of a potential victory for Donald Trump in next week’s US election, but for strategists at Citigroup Inc., a clean sweep for the Republican party will be a signal to sell.】

item.title: 沙特太阳能公司计划大幅提高产量，推动绿色能源发展
item.description: 沙特的一家太阳能公司正计划大幅提高电池板和电池组件的产量，以实现沙特雄心勃勃的可再生能源目标。【原文：A Saudi-based solar company is planning a massive jump in its production of panels and cells as the kingdom races to meet its ambitious renewable energy targets.】

item.title: 人工智能领袖齐聚沙特阿拉伯共商能源大计
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯最大的投资会议上，先进人工智能的梦想与技术对能源的无限需求发生了碰撞。但首先...【原文：At Saudi Arabia’s biggest investment confab, dreams of advanced artificial intelligence collide with the technology’s insatiable energy needs. But first...】
